/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene. The street, divided by a median, stretches out into the distance, flanked by buildings on both sides. The buildings, painted in shades of white and gray, rise up to meet the clear blue sky. Power lines crisscross above the street, adding a touch of urbanity to the scene. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow on the buildings and creating a lens flare in the top left corner of the image. Despite the bustling cityscape, there are no people or moving vehicles visible, lending an air of tranquility to the scene.
